name: emo
description:
Idea

‘emo’ is a popular word used to express bad emotions in the Chinese internet community. The topic of this game is depending on relationships with others to fight against bad emotions and pressure in daily life.

Mechanics

Control 'I' to touch white words, which will create a white line between 'I' and those people. The white line can heal the bad emotion of 'I' and destroy those pressures (red words).  

Control

WASD - Move
